column4: Anyone able to give some guidance regarding ati driver configuration?
So I've been trying to get my tv out to come out in color
what's up w. your ati issue?
specs on the card? program being used, etc?
RADEON 2400 HD, using various drivers, most recently the ati proprietary version, with aticonfig
let me see what i can find, but i know ati and its tv out is pretty iffy
Yeah, that's what I've been hearing..
i'm looking into you're issue, i promise :]

My problem is, on a recent install I was able to control the --tv-geometry through aticonfig.  But on this install, I can't.  I speculate that it has something to do with my various attempts at driver installs.  I'm thinking that it may have something to do with driver conflicts.  So I need to know how to find all the drivers installed, remove them, and start with a fresh, single, install
dude, from what i'm reading, you're lucky to even have tv out at all w. that card :p
Yeah, I know.  But I'm confident there is a way.  There has to be.   Please god, there has to be
have you attempted using the catalyst control center?
At the moment, I don't have a windows manager installed.  Just xserver.  I'm going for a minimal boxee install
ah, i see, sorry, a few more moments of research then. lol
